General.Name: Egis Technology
General.Description: Egis Technology Inc. engages in the IC design, research and development, testing, and sale of capacitive and lens type fingerprint sensors in Taiwan, Asia, and the United States. The company offers data security and biometric identification software and hardware comprising universal 2nd factor fingerprint dongle and mobile authentication solutions. Egis Technology Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Yi-Pin  Lee
1.Title: Sr. VP of the Gen. & Admin. Division and CFO
